mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for West, John J.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: West, John J. Patient Age: 26. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Intermittent fever tertian. Treatment: Sept [September] 24 Rx Sulph. [sulphur] quinine. 6 grams. Take every 4 hoursSept [September] 25 ContinuesSept [September] 26 ContinuesSept [September] 27 Discontinue treatment. Result: Returned to duty.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: West, John J.
Intermittent fever tertian
Private
F
6th VA Inf [6th Virginia Volunteer Infantry]
Virginia
Hospital Number 4542
